article_title: The best lines and quotes of the ABC News GOP debate.
article_text: With Tuesday’s caucus results delivering a dose of momentum to Marco Rubio and demonstrating Donald Trump’s vulnerability, Saturday's GOP debate is certainly not one to ignore. Will Trump’s bravado be tempered by some humility? Or will he see it as an opportunity to reclaim his position? Will other candidates approach the podium with a new sense of authority and conviction? In any case we’re collecting the best lines of tonight’s debate right here.

article_summary:
In any case we’re collecting the best lines of tonight’s debate right here.
With Tuesday’s caucus results delivering a dose of momentum to Marco Rubio and demonstrating Donald Trump’s vulnerability, Saturday's GOP debate is certainly not one to ignore.
Will Trump’s bravado be tempered by some humility?
Will other candidates approach the podium with a new sense of authority and conviction?
Or will he see it as an opportunity to reclaim his position?
